ygData.subject: RE: Places to for a low level cleric to hunt (used t o be unrest)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... For me it was usually OK, root seemed to work pretty well... but every now and again I d get a rogue crow - usually blue - that took me to within an inch
ygData.messageBody:
> Just be careful with it because the scarecrows seem to have
> very good magic
> resistance... I never had very good luck soloing them until
> they got to be blue.

For me it was usually OK, root seemed to work pretty well... but every now
and again I'd get a rogue crow - usually blue - that took me to within an
inch of my life. Never killed me though. I started soloing them at 16 and
went on to 19 pretty easily (playing catchup with my normal group, heh). The
other thing about them is they are a handy point on the Qeynos-Splitpaw
route which (as all Qeynos clerics know) is the level 19 spell quest route.

> if there are 2 or 3 other people there, you may as
> well go hunt
> someplace else becasue there aren't enough scarecrows for everybody.

This is where I am glad that I play mornings and lunchtimes GMT...

Elbeno
